lines:
vos

ile

depend upon your good 
quidance. Words can not 
liberate my feelings, and 
Shope you will accept 
my heart, thanks in 
there few lines. En closing 
you a draft for five 
hundred dollars gold 
which I hope will be 
sufficient to depan my 
son's expenses including 
tinction ets for a few 
months.

sodden

en windd

bodo 
sedd med

sanne

de

evident de

Yours most truly

K. Y. Kwan
raw: vos ile depend upon your good quidance. Words can not liberate my feelings, and Shope you will accept my heart, thanks in there few lines. En closing you a draft for five hundred dollars gold which I hope will be sufficient to depan my son's expenses including tinction ets for a few months. sodden en windd bodo sedd med sanne de evident de Yours most truly K. Y. Kwan

metadata.name: Phillips Academy
metadata.abstract: Letter stating that while they had a pleasant Christmas, they request $10 each to cover expenses through the holidays.
metadata.collection: Head of School (Stearns) correspondence with Chinese alumni
